instruction: 你需要总结出chat_history里的每一条事实信息（fact），越精简越好。按照模板：{"facts": ["",]} 输出内容。

chat_history: Sarah: Alex, we just found another body near the docks.
Alex: Damn it. This makes the fourth one this month. Any leads?
Sarah: Not much. Just the same symbol carved into the victim's arm.
Alex: (examining the body) It's the same pattern. This guy is taunting us.
Sarah: We need to catch him before he strikes again.
Alex: (frustrated) I know. But we’re running out of time.
Sarah: What about the surveillance footage from the last crime scene?
Alex: (sighs) Nothing useful. He knows how to avoid cameras.
Sarah: Maybe we need to think outside the box.
Alex: (nodding) Agreed. Let’s revisit the old cases, look for any overlooked connections.
Sarah: I'll get the files. Also, Alex... I’m sorry about your sister.
Alex: (pauses) Thanks, Sarah. We’ll find her. I won’t stop until we do.
Sarah: I believe you. Let’s get to work.
Alex: Right. First, let’s talk to the families of the victims. Maybe they noticed something unusual.
Sarah: Good idea. I'll call them and set up interviews.
Alex: (thinking) There has to be something we’re missing. Some detail that ties everything together.
Sarah: We’ll find it. We have to.
Alex: (determined) Let’s hope it’s sooner rather than later.

facts: Alex and Sarah are working together on a series of mysterious disappearances.
The latest victim was found near the docks with a symbol carved into their arm.
The case becomes personal for Alex when his sister goes missing.
The suspect knows how to avoid surveillance cameras.
Alex and Sarah decide to revisit old cases for overlooked connections.
They plan to interview the families of the victims for any unusual observations.

instruction: 你需要总结出chat_history里的每一条事实信息（fact），越精简越好。按照模板：{"facts": ["",]} 输出内容。

chat_history: Liam: Emma, I’ve done it! I’ve cracked time travel!
Emma: (skeptical) Liam, you’ve been saying that for years.
Liam: No, seriously. Look at this! (shows the device)
Emma: (examines the device) Okay, suppose it works. What’s your plan?
Liam: We go back to witness the signing of the Declaration of Independence!
Emma: (concerned) Time travel is risky. We could change the future.
Liam: (dismissive) We’ll be careful. We’ll just observe.
Emma: (reluctant) Fine. But if anything goes wrong, we come back immediately.
Liam: Deal. Let’s set the date and time. Ready?
Emma: (nervous) As ready as I’ll ever be.
Liam: (activates the device) Here we go!
Emma: (gasping) It’s... it’s actually working!
Liam: Told you! Now, let’s find a good spot to watch without being seen.
Emma: (whispering) Look, over there! They’re signing it!
Liam: (excited) Incredible. We’re witnessing history!
Emma: Remember, Liam. We’re just observing.
Liam: (nodding) Yeah, yeah. Just observing.
Emma: (suddenly) Wait! Someone’s coming!
Liam: Quick, hide behind those bushes!
Emma: (breathing heavily) That was close.
Liam: (grinning) This is just the beginning, Emma. Think of all the events we can witness!
Emma: (sighs) Let’s just get through this one without causing any problems.

facts: Liam discovers a way to travel through time.
He convinces his cautious friend Emma to join him.
They plan to witness the signing of the Declaration of Independence.
Emma is concerned about the risks of time travel.
They successfully travel back in time and find a spot to observe.
They witness the historical event but have a close call with being seen.

instruction: 你需要总结出chat_history里的每一条事实信息（fact），越精简越好。按照模板：{"facts": ["",]} 输出内容。

chat_history: Elara: Kael, the kingdom is dying. We need to find the Heart of Eternity.
Kael: (nodding) I know, Princess. The journey will be dangerous.
Elara: (determined) We have no choice. The curse is spreading.
Kael: (preparing weapons) We’ll need supplies and a map of the ancient ruins.
Elara: (packing) I’ve already got everything ready. Let’s move out.
Kael: (leading the way) Stay close, Princess. The forest is full of dangers.
Elara: (following) I can handle myself, Kael. I’ve been trained.
Kael: (smiling) I don’t doubt it. But I’m here to protect you.
Elara: (serious) We must find the artifact before it’s too late.
Kael: (alert) Quiet. I hear something.
Elara: (whispering) What is it?
Kael: (drawing sword) Bandits. Stay behind me.
Bandit Leader: (mocking) Well, well, what do we have here? A princess and her guard.
Kael: (angrily) Stand down, or you’ll regret it.
Bandit Leader: (laughing) Big words. Get them, boys!
Elara: (casting spell) Kael, watch out!
Kael: (fighting) Nice spell, Princess!
Elara: (breathing heavily) Let’s keep moving. We can’t waste time.
Kael: (nodding) Agreed. The ruins are just ahead.
Elara: (determined) The Heart of Eternity will save our people. We have to find it.
Kael: (resolute) We will. No matter what.

facts: Princess Elara and the warrior Kael are on a quest to find a mythical artifact.
The artifact, the Heart of Eternity, can save their kingdom from a curse.
The journey is dangerous and filled with obstacles.
They encounter bandits in the forest and have to fight them off.
Elara uses her magical abilities to aid Kael in battle.
They continue their quest, determined to find the artifact and save their people.
